DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare self-report functional outcome measure , medical readiness healthcare utilization ( overall cost imaging , prescription medication pain , follow-up visit ) soldier musculoskeletal injury first see physical therapist versus primary care provider .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Two Different Entry Portal Pathways Into Primary Care Musculoskeletal Injury
